title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Donate
body: Donate       We appreciate your interest in making a donation to Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park.  You can make a donation:  Directly to Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park If you make the gift directly to Klondike Gold Rush NHP, the entire gift will be used for interpretation, research and enhancing visitor experiences. No administrative costs are deducted from your gift when given directly to the National Park Service for use at Klondike Gold Rush NHP. Your check will be deposited in a government account and the full amount will be used for park programs. Government accounts are non-interest bearing. To give directly to Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park, please mail your check to: Superintendent Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park PO Box 517 Skagway, AK 99840   Through Alaska Geographic The advantage of making a tax exempt donation to Alaska Geographic is that the amount will be deposited in an interest-bearing account to assist projects or programs as requested and prioritized by park managers.   Through Friends of the Klondike Corridor Donations to Friends of the Klondike Corridor are tax exempt and used to preserve historic sites along the route to the Klondike.  They accept general donations as well as donations for specific projects.  Visit their website to see what projects they are currently working on.
